Notes.Text:
This update for taglib fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-11439: The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function allowed remote
  attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a
  crafted audio file (bsc#1096180)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function in oggflacfile.cpp in TagLib 1.11.1 allows remote attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted audio file.
